data.text: @Delta Yes I asked for burn cream and almost missed my flight waiting for it. Every lounge should be keeping this in stock… and maybe liquidy foods should not be kept 12 degrees below boiling. I have soup all the time in the lounge and most of the time it’s just above warm (100% fine)

urls.title: Northwest Orient Airlines commercial - We Give You Half The World (Steve Karmen 1974) Remastered
urls.description: I isolated the audio track and remastered it using Sony Sound Forge Pro 11.0 to repair a skip, lengthen the track, clean up the levels using a graphic equali...

data.text:
@librarian_ra @Delta https://t.co/0FgI4nGoAR

Kinda related as Delta later acquired Northwest, one of my all time favorite airline commercials. Also note at 1:03 you see the shadow of the learjet passing over the B747. Great stuff.
